name: Domain of the Undead
text:
(This card's name is always treated as "Vampire Kingdom"). 
 "Vampire" Xyz monsters you control can activate their effects during either players turn. Once per turn, when a card(s) is sent from your opponent's Deck to the GY: Target 1 card on the field; send 1 DARK "Vampire" monster from your hand or Deck to the GY, and if you do, send that target to the GY. Once per turn: If you Xyz Summon a "Vampire" monster with a monster that was originally your opponents: You can pay 500 LP; add 1 "Vampire" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only activate 1 "Domain of the Undead" per turn.
